text: @AC360 @CNN @andersoncooper I would like to know if they have included those who have died of Cancer, heart attacks, car accidents,etc. with the Coronavirus count of death count? Because all of sudden all you hear is about Coronavirus deaths plus I think they have included other death together!!!!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
